detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with buttons at the shoulders, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and roll-edge hems.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.

Shirt in a soft linen and cotton blend with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a small, frilled stand-up collar with ties and an opening at the top. Long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and decorative gathers at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in crinkled jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a smocked bodice with a frill trim at the top, and a softly draping, flared skirt. Unlined.
Cropped, fitted top in crinkled jersey with broderie anglaise. Sweetheart neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders.
Top in soft, brushed jersey with a small stand-up collar, long, wide raglan sleeves and a straight hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Sandals in imitation suede decorated with tassels. Ankle strap with an adjustable metal fastener and rubber soles.
A pair of octagonal metal earrings.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and straight legs.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, open back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups with roll edges at the hems.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist with wide elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Low crotch and tapered legs with wide, elasticated ribbing at the hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with a flounce at the top.

Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front and long raglan sleeves with a mesh detail and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Large side pockets with a concealed zip in the side seams. Regular Fit.
Smocked bikini top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Moisturising lip balm in a rabbit-shaped plastic container with an opening underneath. 2.1 g.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Ribbed cuffs and a seam at the hem with a raw-edge flounce.
Jacket in soft fleece with a high collar, zip down the front and a yoke in woven fabric. Side pockets, a zipped chest pocket, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist and fake front pockets. One pair with back pockets.
Ankle-length trousers in pleated jersey with a sheen. High, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
Sleeveless jersey top with ties at the hem.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Short-sleeved jersey nightdress with a print motif on the front.
Dungaree shorts in a patterned viscose weave with a concealed zip at the back and shoulder straps with adjustable fastenings that cross at the back.
Short dress in a viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Captain’s cap in woven fabric with knots at the sides and braiding at the front. Lined.
Coat in a woven wool blend with a hood and concealed press-studs down the front. Tie belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and a pair of shorts in organic cotton. Jersey bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print and terry motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal and fabric bracelets in various designs. Adjustable length.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knitted jumper with a motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded shaft, elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Blouse in airy chiffon with pin-tucks and concealed buttons down the front. Short, wide raglan sleeves with sewn-in pleats at the shoulders. Lined front and back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Bucket hat in a cotton weave with a frayed edge. Width of brim approx. 5 cm.

Shirt in a stretch premium cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Shaping seams at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with short cap sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline.
Lace skirt with concealed elastication at the waist, a gathered seam at the hips and a crocheted, scalloped trim at the hem. Lined.
Cable-knit hat with a faux fur pompom.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lace appliqué on the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a strappy top, top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey. Strappy top with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Top with short sleeves. Both with gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy. Leggings with a wide waist panel.
Sarong in patterned satin with ties at the sides. Can be worn as a skirt in a variety of lengths.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.
Longer-style blouse in airy cotton poplin with a collar and deep V-neck. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft jersey made from a cotton and silk blend with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.

Jumpsuit in twill made from a viscose blend with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back, flap chest pockets, and side pockets. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, zip fly and tapered legs with wide, covered elastication at the hems. Unlined.
Short jumper in a soft, loose knit with a knot detail at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Ankle-length jeans in sturdy denim with a high waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal front pockets, back pockets and straight legs with twisted seams that taper to the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Scarf in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm. The polyester content of the scarf is partly recycled.
Ankle-length jersey trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Microfibre shaping bikers with a high waist, lined gusset and legs. Firm sculpting effect on the tummy, seat and thighs. Seamless.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave. Relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front and rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections and a concealed drawstring at the waist with a key pocket in the waistband.
Crop tops in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Thong briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset and string back.
Top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
V-neck dress in soft, ribbed jersey with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides.
Scarf in a soft weave with a brushed finish and fringe trims on the short sides. Size 40x210 cm.

Maxi dress in a crêpe weave made partly from recycled polyester with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, wrapover funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with short, wide sleeves and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and ties at one side. Unlined.

prod_name: D1 PE - PANAMA BELT PIN BUCKLE
detail_desc: Belt in study, crocodile-patterned leather with a rectangular metal buckle and button stud fastening. Width 1.8 cm.
Weekend bag in nylon with two imitation leather handles and a zip and drawstring at the top. One zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 20x35x45 cm.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a bow at the front and loop at the back. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Fabric belt with an adjustable metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Top in striped cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline and long sleeves.
